product.title: The Princess and the Frog | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
Usually, a storybook kiss turns a frog into a prince. Not this time. The Princess and the Frog is a modern twist on a classic tale. Set in New Orleans, the beautiful Tiana dreams of opening a restaurant in an old sugar mill. When she meets a frog prince who desperately wants to be human again, her kiss leads them both on a hilarious adventure through the bayous of Louisiana, where (surprisingly) dreams can come true. Your child will be enchanted upon meeting Disney's newest princess!

Tie-in Activity: Cooking plays a huge role in The Princess and the Frog, and cooking with your child is a wonderful way to bond. It is also a good way to teach math concepts and following directions. Let your child help you prepare a tasty gumbo recipe or even macaroni and cheese. Either way, you're cooking up something special.
